comments.body: We have `KubernetesUtils` that is supposed to be the place for all K8s-related utility methods.

not used, and if it were, perhaps would be clearer as

```scala
(opt1, opt2) match {
  case (Some(val1), None) =>
    ...
  case (None, Some(val2)) =>
    ...
  case _ => // ok
}
```

comments.body: This is part of unused code that could be fixed in other PR (e.g. #21462). Will double check after merging master, but normally, client-mode does not impact this.
